description: SVD merge policy for combining upstream and custom SVD sources

priority.description: Higher priority sources override lower ones when duplicates are found

duplicate_files.description: When same device exists in both sources, use custom-svd version

different_content.description: Warn user if content differs significantly, then use custom

version_mismatch.description: If both have version info, use the newer version regardless of source

missing_version.description: If version info is missing, default to custom-svd

require_vendor_readme.description: Warn if vendor directory lacks README.md

require_valid_xml.description: Reject SVD files with invalid XML syntax

warn_on_missing_peripherals.description: Warn if SVD has no peripheral definitions

check_file_size.description: Warn if SVD file is suspiciously small (<1KB) or large (>10MB)

cache.description: Cache SVD discovery results for 1 hour
